insert.foreach: INSERT INTO `rsv_menu` (rsv_mn_name, rsv_mn_cnt, rsv_mn_price, rsv_mn_date, rsv_mn_idx, rsv_no) VALUES(#{tmp.rsv_mn_name}, #{tmp.rsv_mn_cnt}, #{tmp.rsv_mn_price}, NOW(), #{tmp.rsv_mn_idx}, #{rsv_no});

mapper.select: SELECT ms.*, r.rsv_no, DATE_FORMAT(r.rsv_day, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS rsv_day, r.rsv_personnel, r.rsv_sub_id, r.rsv_sub_name, r.rsv_sub_tel, r.rsv_sub_email, r.rsv_sub_request, r.str_number, r.rsv_delete, r.rsv_code FROM `reservation` r INNER JOIN (SELECT s.str_number, s.str_name, s.str_tel, s.str_address, s.str_begintime, s.str_endtime, s.str_personnel, s.str_delete, m.mb_id, m.mb_email, m.mb_name FROM `member` m INNER JOIN `store` s ON m.mb_id = s.mb_id) ms ON r.str_number = ms.str_number WHERE r.rsv_no=#{rsv_no};

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS exp, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS com, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS can FROM `reservation` WHERE rsv_sub_id=#{rsv_sub_id}

UPDATE `rsv_menu` SET rsv_mn_name=#{tmp.rsv_mn_name}, rsv_mn_cnt=#{tmp.rsv_mn_cnt}, rsv_mn_price=#{tmp.rsv_mn_price} WHERE rsv_mn_idx=#{tmp.rsv_mn_idx} AND rsv_no=#{rsv_no};
